Package controller.handlers

Class MaintenanceFeaturesHandler

java.lang.Object
controller.handlers.MaintenanceFeaturesHandler
public class MaintenanceFeaturesHandler extends Object
The MaintenanceFeaturesHandler class handles user interactions with the MaintenanceFeatures view and controls the flow of the application based on user choices.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description

    Constructs a new MaintenanceFeaturesHandler with the provided components and model.

  • Constructor Details

    • MaintenanceFeaturesHandler

      public MaintenanceFeaturesHandler(com.view.MaintenanceFeatures mainteNormalFeatures, com.view.Restock restockNormal, model.Factory model, com.view.ChangePrice changePrice, com.view.PendingBalance pendingBalance, com.view.PrintTransactions printTransactions, com.view.FeatureSelector featureSelector)
      Constructs a new MaintenanceFeaturesHandler with the provided components and model.
      Parameters:
      mainteNormalFeatures - The MaintenanceFeatures view for which this handler is responsible.
      restockNormal - The Restock view to be shown for restocking items.
      model - The Factory model that will be updated based on user interactions.
      changePrice - The ChangePrice view to be shown for changing item prices.
      pendingBalance - The PendingBalance view to be shown for viewing pending balances.
      printTransactions - The PrintTransactions view to be shown for printing transaction summaries.
      featureSelector - The FeatureSelector view from which this handler is called.

  • Method Details

    • handleChangePrice

      public void handleChangePrice()
      Handles the "Change Price" button click event in the MaintenanceFeatures view. Disposes the MaintenanceFeatures view and shows the ChangePrice view with updated data from the model.

    • handleRestock

      public void handleRestock()
      Handles the "Restock" button click event in the MaintenanceFeatures view. Disposes the MaintenanceFeatures view and shows the Restock view with updated data from the model.

    • handleCollectMoney

      public void handleCollectMoney()
      Handles the "Collect Money" button click event in the MaintenanceFeatures view. Disposes the MaintenanceFeatures view and shows the PendingBalance view with machine and pending currency data from the model.

    • handlePrintTransactions

      public void handlePrintTransactions()
      Handles the "Print Transactions" button click event in the MaintenanceFeatures view. Disposes the MaintenanceFeatures view and shows the PrintTransactions view with transaction data from the model.

    • handleReturn

      public void handleReturn()
      Handles the "Return" button click event in the MaintenanceFeatures view. Disposes the MaintenanceFeatures view and shows the FeatureSelector view.
